[["currentConversationId","pins","agentExecutionMode","isPanelCollapsed","displayedAnnouncements","conversations","a|0|1|2|3|4|5","d61e7d5d-18e2-4af1-9da4-147a5735902b","o|","manual","b|F","a|","a|7","id","createdAtIso","lastInteractedAtIso","selectedModelId","requestIds","isPinned","isShareable","extraData","personaType","rootTaskUuid","toolUseStates","chatHistory","feedbackStates","draftExchange","a|D|E|F|G|H|I|J|K|L|M|N|O|P|Q","2026-01-15T11:06:16.110Z","2026-01-15T11:15:32.406Z","claude-sonnet-4-5","isAgentConversation","a|V","b|T","o|W|X","n|0","e2b52f04-b7dc-4a82-b41b-7c502628df61","request_id","uuid","chatItemType","status","fromTimestamp","toTimestamp","seen_state","a|b|c|d|e|f|g|h","6cb25c07-904c-4f00-8b8e-64b29ce58952","74be6bad-75a1-406c-9f8a-0eb508b0bf94","agentic-checkpoint-delimiter","success","n|V8Mvc36","seen","o|i|j|k|l|m|Z|n|o","exchangeUuid","timestamp","request_message","a|d|q|r|s|e|h","exchange-pointer","b7079722-5cbf-4173-aebd-87021848e161","2026-01-15T11:06:17.334Z","Provide a short summary of this project","o|t|u|v|w|x|m|o","2898a5cd-aab1-4ed2-8899-d2203e2257a4","2026-01-15T11:06:51.664Z","Pozdrav, šta misliš jel mi mozes pomoci da napravim ovaj projekt i da me ne kosta nista novaca ai da onda sve fino lijepo objavim i publisham na linkedinu :

Project Brief


Understanding the Client's Vision
CloudPipe is a small web development company that builds websites for local businesses. Currently, their developers manually upload files to production servers whenever they make changes. This manual process is time-consuming and prone to errors.

They want to modernize their workflow by implementing a basic CI/CD pipeline that automatically deploys their website changes whenever code is pushed to GitHub. The goal is to make deployments faster, more reliable, and less stressful for their team.

The Problem Landscape
Let's look at their current challenges:

Manual Deployment Issues
Every time a developer needs to update a website, they have to:

Download the latest files from GitHub

Manually upload these files to the production server

Hope they didn't forget any files

Check if everything still works

For example, last week a developer forgot to upload an updated JavaScript file, causing the contact form to stop working for several hours before anyone noticed.

Time Wastage
Their developers spend valuable time on repetitive deployment tasks instead of building features. A simple text change on a website can take 15-20 minutes to deploy, when it should take seconds.

Solution Requirements
CloudPipe needs a straightforward solution that automates their deployment process.

Core Requirements
Automated Deployment

Code pushes to GitHub should trigger automatic deployments

Developers should see if their deployment succeeded or failed

Basic error notifications if something goes wrong

Infrastructure Needs

AWS S3 for static website hosting

GitHub Actions for automation

Simple deployment logs

Why These Requirements Matter
This simplified approach offers clear benefits:

Developers can focus on coding instead of deployment tasks

Website updates happen automatically and consistently

The team can quickly see if something went wrong

No more forgotten files during deployment

Success Criteria
The solution will be successful if:

Deployments happen automatically when code is pushed

The team knows immediately if a deployment failed

Website updates are consistent and reliable

The process is faster than manual deployment

This streamlined foundation focuses on the most important aspect - getting from code commit to live website automatically and reliably.","o|t|u|z|10|11|m|o","a|d|q|s|e|h","68e64e04-6470-41f2-985d-3d21c587a97a","","o|13|u|14|15|m|o","53cb3e18-943d-43cf-84e3-422dc615e9ec","2026-01-15T11:07:03.838Z","o|t|u|17|18|15|m|o","991a994f-a462-4c51-8464-877d420b5901","2026-01-15T11:07:08.446Z","o|t|u|1A|1B|15|m|o","517bf684-3820-44d3-8a74-47f42c895447","2026-01-15T11:07:39.642Z","o|t|u|1D|1E|15|m|o","temp-fe-765bdc1f-e5bf-4235-8752-2ef8ca29b1e2","2026-01-15T11:08:02.069Z","cancelled","o|t|u|1G|1H|15|1I|o","a|b|e|d|h","0361d5b5-9ee0-43d8-87f7-7c65b2c0277e","agentic-turn-delimiter","o|1K|1L|1I|1M|o","e4d260f5-5f8f-48e5-8d8f-72824b6b4748","2026-01-15T11:09:08.066Z","ček ček, prvo mi reci gdje da provjerim i jesam li u dobrom accountu svoj račun dali jos imam free tier?
